channel.title: Creations on Sayesha Aravapalli
channel.description: Recent content in Creations on Sayesha Aravapalli

item.title: Google Analytics
item.description: A consulting project for a Dallas based start-up to understand customer base. The goal of this project was to help the management understand where to allocate their resources to increase their current customer base. Additionally, it was attempted to advise management on its consideration to invest in google analytics 360 as an analysis platform.

item.title: Instagram Engagement
item.description: Considering that in 2014 social users posted an average of 1.8 billion photos to the internet daily and the growth of image-centric platforms like Instagram, Snapchat and Pinterestmakes analyzing visual data also very important to understand your audience. Using data scraped form the Instagrampage of Natgeo, this project answers the question What should National Geographic do to increase engagement on its Instagram page?

item.title: Recommendation Engine
item.description: Today in the world of personalized marketing, it is important to understand each customer and target them accordingly. The task of analyzing customer behaviour from humongous is a challenging one and this project attempts to recommend books to users based on their given ratings of other books. The dataset used is Goodreads book rating data.
